sentences.en: A less careful caress may make it crinkle or crack.
sentences.cn: 倘谁一不小心,就会把她揉皱,捻出裂纹.

sentences.en: He smiled boyishly, crinkling his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眯起眼睛，笑得像个孩子。

sentences.en: Her face crinkled up in disgust.
His mouth crinkled into a smile.
I made the book crinkle and black with a mess.
sentences.cn: 我把那本作文选揉皱了,揩黑了.

sentences.en: Mossy green envelops his in the early spring, crispy caress may make it crinkle or crack.
sentences.cn: 初春的时候,他浑身绿茸茸的, 又脆又嫩.倘谁一不小心,就会把他揉皱,捻出裂纹.

sentences.en: Soybean protein fiber is of many excellent properties, but poor crinkle - proof and dimension stability.
sentences.cn: 大豆蛋白纤维具有许多优良的服用性能, 但存在抗皱性和尺寸稳定性差的缺陷.

sentences.en: Soybean protein fiber is of many excellent properties, but poor crinkle - proof and dimension statility.
sentences.cn: 摘要大豆蛋白纤维具有许多优良的服用性能, 但存在抗皱性和尺寸稳定性差的缺陷.

sentences.en: The first crinkles of age were beginning to appear round her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛周围开始出现显示她年龄的细纹。

sentences.en: Upper is wear - resistant and crinkle resistant cowhide. Unique design of laser carve. Lining is anti - bacteria and anti - odor.
sentences.cn: 鞋面采用牛皮, 耐磨 、防皱. 鞋身采用新颖的激光雕刻工艺.

sentences.en: Wear - resistant and crinkle - resistant cowhide as upper. Mesh is breathable, lightweight, ripstop and wear - resistant.
sentences.cn: 采用优质牛皮, 耐磨,防皱. 鞋面采用透气性好, 轻量化 、 抗撕裂的耐磨网布.

sentences.en: Wear - resistant and crinkle - resistant first layer as upper.
sentences.cn: 采用头层牛皮, 耐磨,防皱.

words.tran_cn: 起皱的；卷缩的；绉褶多的

trans.tran_en: a thin fold, especially in your skin or on cloth, paper etc
if you crinkle part of your face, or if it crinkles, you move it so that small lines appear on it
